page.title: 13Farming
page.content: The main crops grown in Seamer and Irton area are wheat and barley.A good example of this is on Low Eastfield Farm where these two crops are grown as well as grass for silage.This farm also keeps 200 bullocks.This farm is very well equipped as it needs to be to cover its 340 acres of land.All the farms in this area are intensively farmed as there are about 6 farms in a small area.All the farms have many tractors,trailors,ploughs and a couple of combine harvesters.They also employ workers to help them in their daily routine.There are two types of farms in this area,one being arable and the other being dairy.Low Eastfield Farm also has a small registered caravan site to help to bring in some extra money.This area is extremely efficient in it's farming techniques.
